value_i18n.en_US: Connect all data sources, enrich them and improve your business
Collect data from any connected device and enrich them with information from legacy systems and sources outside the company.
Created to allow companies operating in different sectors and contexts to transform data from their physical and virtual objects into strategic information:
Process data generated by the connected devices
Enrich data by correlating them with those coming from the internal and external legacy application / cloud sources of the company

Device Connector Framework
The module that manages the communication flow and stores information. It allows you to manage the connectivity with the systems and sensors of industrial machines.

Analytics Module
The module that presents information in the form of indicators, correlating and enriching data thanks to the context database.

Machine Learning
Use information from previous modules to create predictive analytics that trigger notifications and alerts depending on business roles.
